name: The Dyke Count
description:
THe STORMy Night ...

The Tide is high ...

Let the WHITE-Horse-Man RETURN & build a DYKE that separates the GREEN Mainland from the WATER to save the People & their Home.

Time is running out ... so you should ride for Your Life!

And for The Life of the Others too ... Good Luck, Dykemaster Hauke!

And many thanks to T.S. for his inspiring novel !!!
